name: SPACE COLORS
description:
SPACE COLORS is an open-world shmup/RPG/roguelike. Start at Level 1 and go about conquering the world for as long as you can. Collect pickups from destroyed enemies to help boost your health and upgrade your weaponry. The on-screen radar will highlight asteroids, enemies, and mission critical (gold) objects in range. 

Use the mouse and click to move, and space bar to fire. Double click to use a bomb. You can also use up/down arrow (or w/s) to go forward/backwards in conjunction with the mouse, if you're not a fan of clicking. 

Kill everything that moves.

NOTE: Pre-alpha. More is coming. More is always coming.
